model

Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Item
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Item
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Author:
    Joey This is the item class that is designed to build and item to be stored in the inventory for the project. The Item class will implement serializable interface (Decarotor Pattern). The item also acts as the model in the MVC pattern.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
